refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis:
Interface: org.freedesktop.ConsoleKit.Session
Methods: GetId (out STRING ssid) GetSeatId (out STRING sid) GetUser (out INT32 uid) GetIdleHint (out BOOLEAN hint) SetIdleHint (in BOOLEAN hint) GetIdleSinceHint (out STRING iso8601_datetime) GetCreationTime (out STRING iso8601_datetime) GetRemoteHostName (out STRING hostname) GetDisplayDevice (out STRING device) GetX11DisplayDevice (out STRING device) GetX11Display (out STRING display) GetSessionType (out STRING type) IsLocal (out BOOLEAN local) IsActive (out BOOLEAN active) Unlock () Lock () Activate ()
Signals: ActiveChanged (BOOLEAN active) IdleHintChanged (BOOLEAN hint) Unlock () Lock ()
Properties:
